Name: The Legend of Korra
Overview: An ancient evil force has emerged from the portals and threatens the balance of both worlds! Only the Avatar stands a chance in defeating this new threat! •Original Avatar storyline penned by the TV show’s creators. •Wield the power of all 4 elements—water, earth, fire, and air as only the Avatar can! •Change bending styles at any time to unleash devastating combos. •Beat overwhelming odds by activating the all-powerful Avatar state.
